actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within the Great White Heron Refuge, National Key Deer Refuge, and the Key West National Wildlife Refuge, Fla.

summary.text: Provides for the designation as wilderness of specified lands within the Great White Heron Refuge, National Key Deer Refuge, and the Key West National Wildlife Refuge, Florida.

titles.title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within the Great White Heron Refuge, National Key Deer Refuge, and the Key West National Wildlife Refuge, Fla.
